BasicDescription.Title: Urban Cowboy
BasicDescription.Synopsis: John Travolta stars as Bud, a cowboy who moves to Houston to work at an oil refinery only to find his life revolving around a honky-tonk club where he falls in love with a cowgirl. W/S. [1980]

Drama starring John Travolta and Debra Winger.
New to Houston, Bud Davis meets feisty Sissy in a popular honky-tonk bar, but the pair's passionate relationship has more ups and downs than the bar's mechanical rodeo bull, a device that fascinates them both. [1980]
Buford 'Bud' Davis ...... John Travolta Sissy ...... Debra Winger Wes Hightower ...... Scott Glenn Pam ...... Madolyn Smith Uncle Bob ...... Barry Corbin Aunt Corene ...... Brooke Alderson

BasicDescription.Title: Weather View
BasicDescription.Synopsis: Detailed weather forecast.

BasicDescription.Title: BBC News 24
BasicDescription.Synopsis: BBC ONE joins the BBC's rolling news channel for a night of news, with bulletins on the hour and the headlines every 15 minutes.

BasicDescription.Title: Breakfast
BasicDescription.Synopsis: Start your day with all the latest news, sport, business and weather from the BBC's Breakfast team. Includes regional news at 25 and 55 minutes past each hour.

BasicDescription.Title: Kilroy
BasicDescription.Synopsis: Robert Kilroy-Silk hosts topical debate and discussion with his studio audience. Followed by BBC News and Weather.

BasicDescription.Title: Ruby
BasicDescription.Synopsis: Ruby Wax presents a lively mix of big name celebrity chat, audience discussion and studio mayhem. W/S. Then BBC News and Weather.

BasicDescription.Title: Big Strong Boys
BasicDescription.Synopsis: Wheathampstead Family Room: By disguising a computer and paperwork, hiding children's toys and re-juvenating a dining table, this family room comes back to life.

BasicDescription.Title: Trading Up
BasicDescription.Synopsis: Didcot: Gordon Whistance and Hilary Charlewood are in Oxfordshire on a mission to find and freshen up the perfect home for today's buyers. W/S. BBC News and Weather follow.

BasicDescription.Title: Bargain Hunt
BasicDescription.Synopsis: David Dickinson provides contestants with �200 and an hour at an antiques fair. The experts are on hand to help, but will the items make a profit at auction?

BasicDescription.Title: Wipeout
BasicDescription.Synopsis: Bob Monkhouse hosts the humorous general knowledge quiz where if you know the subject it's easy but if you don't, wipeout awaits.

BasicDescription.Title: BBC News
BasicDescription.Synopsis: The latest national and international news from the BBC this lunchtime, including Weather.

BasicDescription.Title: BBC London News
BasicDescription.Synopsis: The latest stories from the BBC London newsroom.

BasicDescription.Title: Neighbours
BasicDescription.Synopsis: Connor enters Nina's song anonymously in the Uni FM Undiscovered contest, and Karl and Susan relive some adolescent fun. Meanwhile, will Joe let Michelle go for her overseas exchange interview?

BasicDescription.Title: Diagnosis Murder
BasicDescription.Synopsis: Teacher's Pet: A man is found murdered. His wife, who was with him at the time, testifies that a gang of robbers broke into the house and killed him. But the evidence doesn't tally.

BasicDescription.Title: As Time Goes By
BasicDescription.Synopsis: A chance meeting results in an invitation to stay the weekend with her sister-in-law. Jean convinces Lionel that he should accompany her.

BasicDescription.Title: Fimbles
BasicDescription.Synopsis: CBeebies. Radio: When Pom finds a radio, she's delighted to hear her favourite song. There's something for everyone on the radio and, best of all, it helps Fimbo find what he's been looking for.

BasicDescription.Title: Woody Woodpecker
BasicDescription.Synopsis: CBBC. Mirage Barrage/Queen Of Denile/Party Animal: Woody gets three wishes, Winnie and Wally look for Egyptian treasure and Woody has a noisy party.

BasicDescription.Title: Mona The Vampire
BasicDescription.Synopsis: CBBC. The Curse Of The Mummy's Tomb: Mona is a ten year old girl who revels in the icky and eerie - when there's a ghoulish mystery to be solved she becomes Mona The Vampire.

BasicDescription.Title: Viva S Club
BasicDescription.Synopsis: CBBC. 24 Minutes Till Doomsday: S-Club are about to go on stage for a concert. Rachel Hannah and Lyall all discover that there's something important they must do before they can go on stage.

BasicDescription.Title: SMart
BasicDescription.Synopsis: CBBC. The art show packed with ideas to help you with your picture making.

BasicDescription.Title: CBBC At The Fame Academy
BasicDescription.Synopsis: CBBC. Catch up with latest from the Academy.

BasicDescription.Title: Newsround
BasicDescription.Synopsis: CBBC. Daily news magazine keeping you up to date on the latest stories and events happening at home and abroad.

BasicDescription.Title: BBC News
BasicDescription.Synopsis: The latest national and international news from the BBC. Includes a weather summary.

BasicDescription.Title: BBC London News
BasicDescription.Synopsis: The latest stories from the BBC London newsroom. W/S. Followed by the national headlines and weather.

BasicDescription.Title: Fame Academy
BasicDescription.Synopsis: With a recording deal and a luxury lifestyle up for grabs the pressure on the three students who remain in the Academy is intense. Who has the determination to win the ultimate prize?

BasicDescription.Title: EastEnders
BasicDescription.Synopsis: Ian sets a plan in motion, and Martin takes a stand against Derek. Meanwhile, Anthony forces Kat to admit how she really feels.

BasicDescription.Title: Holby City
BasicDescription.Synopsis: Leopard Spots: Kath receives an unexpected proposal from Terry and Tom finally discovers the ugly truth about his errant brother.

Michele Dotrice guest stars as Shirley Butler, whose husband, Bob, is suffering from a vascular disease and is devastated when he later dies after a routine operation.
Terry realises how much he loves Kath and decides to propose, but a doctor accidentally divulges Terry's results, which leaves Kath and Lisa devastated.
Tom's errant brother, Marty, turns up again and appears to be a reformed character, until the police arrive to question him on suspicion of dealing drugs in the area. Tom confronts Marty, but there's only one thing he can do to put a stop to Marty's dealings.

BasicDescription.Title: Linda Green
BasicDescription.Synopsis: Matt wants to sell his car because it reminds him of his ex and while he's at the garage he's totally wowed by Linda. But Matt's zest for trying new things soon gets a bit too much for Linda.

Matt wants to sell his car because it reminds him of his ex, and while he,s at the garage he,s totally wowed by Linda. She's won over by his zest for life and desire to try new things. However, horse-riding, golf and a tandem ride later she's starting to get knackered, and the ghost of Matt,s ex just won't go away. Will Matt ever want to just go down the club on a Saturday night and get pissed with her mates? And, just as importantly, why won't he let her get on top during sex?
BasicDescription.PromotionalInformation: BBC Video: Linda Green - The Complete Series DVD

BasicDescription.Title: They Think 2002 Is All Over
BasicDescription.Synopsis: Nick Hancock introduces the funniest clips from the series, using them to tell the story of the sporting year from January through to June.

BasicDescription.Title: BBC News At Ten O'Clock
BasicDescription.Synopsis: National and international news, with reports from BBC correspondents worldwide.

BasicDescription.Title: BBC London News
BasicDescription.Synopsis: The latest stories from the BBC London newsroom.

BasicDescription.Title: The Royle Family At Christmas
BasicDescription.Synopsis: Bloated with turkey, the Royle family gather round the television to enjoy the Christmas edition of Animal Hospital, starring the multi-talented, bearded Australian pensioner, Rolf Harris.

Another chance to see the Christmas special from the second series of the comedy that did for the family sitting room what The Office has done for, well, the office. Baby David's first birthday makes it a double celebration for the Royles as, bloated with turkey, they gather around the television to spread their particular version of Christmas cheer. And this year the family is extended even further by the attendance of Antony's girlfriend Emma and her vegetarian parents. How the other half lives!
BasicDescription.PromotionalInformation: BBC Audio: The Royle Family (2 x cds)

BasicDescription.Title: Fame Academy Uncut
BasicDescription.Synopsis: They started off as 12 but now only 3 students remain in the Academy. They've had fights, friendships and flings. But as the final approaches, who has the talent to win the public vote?

BasicDescription.Title: Chicago Cab
BasicDescription.Synopsis: It's Christmas time in Chicago and a cab driver is subjected to a multitude of different characters who are intent on using his back seat as a therapist's couch. Contains very strong language. [1998]
